desc: Art to carry with you wherever you go. These hand drawn, wearable designs are mindfully created during meditation as keepsakes to celebrate the artist's ancestors.

layout.text: during my summer maternity leave. Commission requests will be considered for Fall 2022 so please reach out via email to get your project rolling. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me on Instagram @cocoabijou.art or email me Kristen@cocoabijou.com 🌞✨
